select mh.id from medical_hospital mh
join medical_hospital_field mhf on mh.id = mhf.hospital_id and mhf.`field_id`=#{field}
where mh.deleted = 0 and mh.status = 1
and mh.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY mh.authentication DESC, mh.score DESC,convert(name using gbk) ASC
SELECT mf.id,mf.name FROM `medical_field` mf LEFT JOIN `medical_hospital_field` mhf ON mf.`id` = mhf.`field_id` GROUP BY mhf.`field_id` ORDER BY COUNT(mhf.`field_id`) DESC LIMIT 0, 8
select * from medical_hospital where deleted = 0 and status = 1 and recommend = 1 order by recommend_sort desc limit 0, 7
SELECT mf.name FROM `medical_field` mf, `medical_hospital_field` mhf WHERE mf.`id` = mhf.`field_id` and mhf.hospital_id = #{hospitalId}

SELECT mh.id, mh.name, mh.lal, mh.description, mh.tel, mh.email, mh.province, mh.city, mh.detailed_address, mh.score, mh.authentication, mh.recommend, mh.front_img, mh.wechat, mh.head_portrait, mh.contactor, mhp.`picture`, mf.`name` fieldName FROM medical_hospital mh LEFT JOIN `medical_hospital_picture` mhp ON mh.`id`=mhp.`hospital_id` AND mhp.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN `medical_hospital_field` mhf ON mh.id = mhf.`hospital_id` LEFT JOIN `medical_field` mf ON mf.`id`=mhf.`field_id` WHERE mh.deleted = 0 AND mh.status = 1 and mh.id = #{id}

SELECT md.id, md.name, md.title,md.status, md.authentication_information_id, md.field_text FROM medical_doctor md where md.deleted = 0 AND md.id IN( SELECT mhd.doctor_id FROM medical_hospital_doctor mhd WHERE hospital_id = #{hospitalId} )
AND md.name LIKE concat('%',#{doctorName},'%')

SELECT mh.id, mh.name, mh.lal, mh.description, mh.tel, mh.email, mh.province, mh.city, mh.detailed_address, mh.score, mh.authentication, mh.recommend, mh.front_img, mh.wechat, mh.head_portrait, mh.contactor, mhp.`picture`, mf.`name` fieldName FROM medical_hospital mh LEFT JOIN `medical_hospital_picture` mhp ON mh.`id`=mhp.`hospital_id` AND mhp.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN `medical_hospital_field` mhf ON mh.id = mhf.`hospital_id` LEFT JOIN `medical_field` mf ON mf.`id`=mhf.`field_id` WHERE mh.deleted = 0 AND mh.id = #{id}
AND md.status = #{status}
